data.name: Hispanic (US - All)
data.description: People who live in the United States whose activity on Facebook aligns with Hispanic ethnic affinity

data.name: Hispanic (US - Spanish dominant)
data.description: People who live in the United States whose activity on Facebook aligns with Hispanic ethnic affinity and primarily use Spanish.

data.name: Hispanic (US - English dominant)
data.description: People who live in the United States whose activity on Facebook aligns with Hispanic ethnic affinity and primarily use English.

data.name: Hispanic (US - Bilingual)
data.description: People who live in the United States whose activity on Facebook aligns with Hispanic ethnic affinity and primarily use Spanish and English.

data.name: Asian American (US)
data.description: People who live in the United States whose activity on Facebook aligns with East or Southeast Asian American ethnic affinity

data.name: African American (US)
data.description: People who live in the United States whose activity on Facebook aligns with African American ethnic affinity
